markdown.headingText: Check out some of my work
markdown.markdown:
Final Year Business Studies Student in DCU (Analytics Specialism), expected to graduate with first-class honours. I have a strong academic record, achieving 613 points in the Leaving Certificate and a 1.1 grade across the first and second years of the Business Studies curriculum. Gained invaluable experience in the Finance industry through a year-long internship with KKR & Co Inc. Complemented by certifications in SQL, Python, and financial modeling, I am poised to contribute effectively to an analytical role upon graduation in May 2025.

[► My projects can be seen here](projects.qmd) --- ## Core Skills ::: {.skill-grid} ::: {.skill-card} ::: {.skill-icon} ::: ### Python Experienced in Python for ML workflows: data cleaning, exploratory analysis, model development, tuning, evaluation. [→ View Python Projects](projects/baa1027_adv_python.qmd){.btn .btn-primary} ::: ::: {.skill-card} ::: {.skill-icon} ::: ### SQL Proficient in SQL for database querying, data manipulation, and management, ensuring data integrity and accessibility. [→ View SQL Work](projects/programming&visualisation.qmd){.btn .btn-primary} ::: ::: {.skill-card} ::: {.skill-icon} ::: ### Power BI Skilled in Power BI, built interactive US car sales dashboard with DAX metrics, filters, visualisations, cleaned through SQL. [→ View Dashboards](projects/programming&visualisation.qmd){.btn .btn-primary} ::: :::
